message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth discussing a price of $1400000. This is a fair and reasonable offer considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking to make a deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1300000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise further and offer $1250000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm starting to think we're close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $1250000, but I need a bit more. I'm counteroffering at $1280000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can make a deal at this price.

I understand that you're looking to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1240000, and I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. This is my final offer.
